attributes.action: Open The Nightingale Hospitals send all covid cases to the Nightingales
attributes.additional_details: Open the Nightingale Hospitals now to sort and take out all covid cases from the hospitals so others with health problems can get treated before its to late and we end up heading for a E.L.E. (Extinction Level Event)
attributes.background: Open The Nightingale Hospitals as loads can not get treated for other health problems and are left to die

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

Decisions on how to use the Nightingale hospitals as part of local areas' response to the Covid-19 pandemic is an operational matter for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.
